author: smartini
msg: PIVOT-872, put classpath from environment (that now has to be defined with reference to right jars) before the classpath of all jre/lib jars, because since Java 7 Update 7 the JavaFX Runtime (bundled with the jre now) otherwise is used but it contains some classes not-so-good for us.
